root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 17-1-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 17. Strengthen the means of implementing and revitalizing the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development17.1 Improve, in particular through international assistance to developing countries, the mobilization of domestic resources with a view to strengthening national capacities for the collection of taxes and other revenues17.1.1 Total government revenue as a share of GDP, by source5/1/2020 12:00:00 AMOffice Burundaise des Recettes (OBR)BAKURANIMANA DamascusStatistical servicefocal point of the SDGs within the OBR75757705bakurdam@yahoo.frProportion of government revenue in GDP%Administrative data of OBR revenue and ISTEEBU national accounts, 2014Administrative dataAnnualAnnualOBR / ISTEEBUThe OBR is responsible for compiling this indicator at the national levelThe OBR is the body recognized by the Burundian government for the collection, processing and dissemination of official statistics assisting in planning and decision-making.This indicator is relevant because it highlights the proportion of people victims of violence during a year.Ratio of government revenue to GDP, expressed as a percentageInternal validationAvailable nationallyThe indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international level2016
